newsitem.title: ITALY: Minimum rate 6.82 pct at Italy lira repo tender.
newsitem.headline: Minimum rate 6.82 pct at Italy lira repo tender.

text.p: The minimum rate at today's 9.5 trillion lire 29-day Bank of Italy repurchase tender was 6.82 percent, compared with 6.76 percent at the previous repo tender on June 9, the Bank said.
The average rate was 6.83 percent against 6.82 percent at the last repurchase pact for 12.5 trillion lire and 23 days.
The pact covers purchases today and the securities are for resale on July 15. The Bank said it received 40 bids of which 13 were met in full and nine in part.
